sections: You could get a really cool car while doing the right thing.

This is your chance to have a shot at winning this numbers-matching 1969 Chevrolet Camaro Pace Car Convertible while also supporting Ronald McDonald House Central Valley. For being a Motorious reader, you get to use the code
to get double tickets for your entry, increasing your chances of getting the keys to this genuine American muscle car.

Imagine how jealous your neighbors, friends, and family will be when they see you with this car. It’s a beautiful Dover White with Hugger Orange stripe. The orange Houndstooth Bucket Seat Deluxe Interior is just as striking, making this a handsome ride everyone can admire. Don’t forget to
to claim double tickets for your entry.

Of course, this Camaro Pace Car is more than just good-looking. With an L35 396ci V8 putting 325-horsepower on tap it really moves. Thanks to the TH400 automatic transmission, you don’t need to worry about managing a clutch and shifter, but instead can just sit back and enjoy the ride. Instead of just imagining what this car is like,
as your code to get double tickets and up your chances of driving away in this Chevy.

Some nice conveniences come on this ride, like the power convertible top, so you’re not having to get out and deal with an unmanageable soft top. A tilt column has been added, making it easier to get comfortable in this ride. Power steering and power disc brakes really help with keeping the powerful car in check. The lucky person who wins this car even gets factory air conditioning, so this ride is enjoyable throughout the heat of the summer. If you want that to be you,
While it’s great to have a cool car, just remember this is all for charity, Ronald McDonald House Central Valley specifically, so you’re supporting a good cause. Once more, use the
and double your tickets so hopefully you get the ride of your dreams.
